Bryan.KNDE: KNDE (95.1 FM, "Candy 95.1") is a radio station with a Top 40 (CHR) format licensed to College Station, Texas. Candy 95's current line-up features the show "Morning Candy" with Frito and Katy, Mid-Days with Audrey Rose, and The Afternoon Shift with Catnip. It is owned and operated by Bryan Broadcasting Company through its licensee Bryan Broadcasting License Corporation, based locally in College Station, Texas.
